title: runtime: scheduler is overly aggressive trying to assist GC Marking
body:
Code similar to that found in binarytree_test.go found at 
http://benchmarksgame.alioth.debian.org/u64q/program.php?test=binarytrees&lang=go&id=8
experienced more performance regression between 1.4 and tip than binarytree_test.go. 
AB comparisons using VTune reveals that the difference can be attributed to time spent in runtime.findrunnable.
